quest.name: Whacking Day
journal: Kohagi would like you to whack slow, then fast.
objectives: Obtain water serpent livers from the water serpents.
Deliver the water serpent livers to Sentei.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: Could I ask you to help with a problem of mine? It concerns some water serpents that have recently infested the One River.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: They used to only be found further to the west, but, for one reason or another, some have found their way closer to Namai.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: If prepared properly, they are quite delectable. However, there are far more in the river than one could ever hope to cook. No, their numbers must be controlled by other means.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: Please slay a few of them for me. Enough to stop them from taking the whole river for their own. Oh, and should you happen to get your hands on a few of their livers, please deliver them to my husband, Sentei.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: You will find him in the Drunken Toad to the east.

dialogue.name: KOHAGI
dialogue.text: Should you happen to get your hands on a few of their livers, please deliver them to my husband, Sentei, in the Drunken Toad.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Do you have business with me, traveler?

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Water serpent livers! But why did you think to bring these to me?

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Ah, my wife put you up to it, did she? My sincerest thanks. I shall boil these and eat them shortly.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Back in the days when I made my living transporting rice up and down the river, I used to slay any water serpents I saw and take them home to cook. Of course, that all stopped once the Empire blocked off the One River.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: It is thanks to nature and kind strangers like you that I am able to put food on my table these days. Thank you so much.
